DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect two different physiotherapeutic intervention ( exercise therapy and/or abdominal binding ) sign symptoms diastasis recti post-partum woman .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Conservative Interventions Signs Symptoms Diastasis Recti
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate effect exercise therapy and/or abdominal binding inter-rectus distance , abdominal muscle strength endurance , lumbopelvic dysfunction , urogynecological complaint , perceive function , body image post-partum woman diastasis rectus
DOC.criteria: 18 35 year old give birth first child , vaginally , last three four week interrectus distance two finger width great palpation head lift history persistent pain intercourse prior pregnancy diagnose neurological impairment affect central nervous system sacral nerve diagnose connective tissue disorder
